channel.title: *right click* trade shop help
channel.description:
I made a shop as wise old man as seller and put him in shops as number 39 and legends of lore as shop name...I also added him in auto spaw and wanneshop which all works perfects and in shops he is down with several holiday items to sell but when I click on him to talk it says"doesnt feel like talking right now" is there a way to add a right click to it that says trade..."WILL That fix the TRADING PROBLEM??"
[code]} else if (NPCID == 2253) { //Varrock Legends Store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; //Lores of Legends[/code]

item.title: *right click* trade shop help
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

I made a shop as wise old man as seller and put him in shops as number 39 and legends of lore as shop name…I also added him in auto spaw and wanneshop which all works perfects and in shops he is down with several holiday items to sell but when I click on him to talk it says"doesnt feel like talking right now" is there a way to add a right click to it that says trade…“WILL That fix the TRADING PROBLEM??”

} else if (NPCID == 2253) { //Varrock Legends Store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; //Lores of Legends

Read full topic
